articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: SA v IND: Quinton de Kock wanted to retire from all formats, reveals South Africa coach - India Today
articles.description: South Africa white-ball coach Rob Walter has revealed that Quinton de Kock wanted to retire from all formats of the game after World Cup 2023. Walter said that de Kock was stopped from doing it by the South Africa team management.
articles.content: South Africa white-ball coach Rob Walter has made a shocking revelation about opener Quinton de Kock. Walter, while announcing South Africa's squads for the all-format series against India revealed t… [+2095 chars]
